description.brief: Benchmarking Quantum Reinforcement Learning with hyperlax.

package.description: hyperlax is a JAX-based framework for high-throughput reinforcement learning, designed to benchmark and optimize both classical and quantum machine learning models.
package.author: Ugur Bolat/Ugur.Bolat@dfki.de
